headline.print_headline: Brazil's Defence Goes Missing in Embarrassing Defeat
headline.main: Brazil's Defence Goes Missing in Embarrassing Defeat

docs.snippet: Brazil have been blamed for not being attacking enough since the World Cup started but it was their once admired defence that will carry the can for Tuesday's incredible 7-1 loss to Germany....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil have been blamed for not being attacking enough since the World Cup started but it was their once admired defence that will carry the can for Tuesday's incredible 7-1 loss to Germany.

headline.print_headline: Perez Likely to Replace Di Maria for Argentina
headline.main: Perez Likely to Replace Di Maria for Argentina

docs.snippet: Argentina coach Alejandro Sabella says Enzo Perez is likely to replace injured winger Angel di Maria in the World Cup semifinal against the Netherlands....
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentina coach Alejandro Sabella says Enzo Perez is likely to replace injured winger Angel di Maria in the World Cup semifinal against the Netherlands.

headline.print_headline: Pfizer Wins Dismissal of U.S. Investor Class Action Ahead of Trial
headline.main: Pfizer Wins Dismissal of U.S. Investor Class Action Ahead of Trial

docs.snippet: Pfizer Inc won the dismissal Tuesday of a long-running shareholder class action accusing the company of misleading investors about the safety of its Celebrex and Bextra pain-relieving drugs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pfizer Inc won the dismissal Tuesday of a long-running shareholder class action accusing the company of misleading investors about the safety of its Celebrex and Bextra pain-relieving drugs.

docs.snippet: Hosts Brazil suffered their worst World Cup defeat ever when they were crushed 7-1 by Germany in the semi-final in Belo Horizonte on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hosts Brazil suffered their worst World Cup defeat ever when they were crushed 7-1 by Germany in the semi-final in Belo Horizonte on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: NYC Museum's Giant Blue Whale Gets a Dusting
headline.main: NYC Museum's Giant Blue Whale Gets a Dusting

docs.snippet: The American Museum of Natural History's popular blue whale is getting its annual dusting....

headline.print_headline: Ex-Carter's Executives, NY Fund Manager Get Prison for Insider Trading
headline.main: Ex-Carter's Executives, NY Fund Manager Get Prison for Insider Trading

docs.snippet: Two former executives at Carter's Inc and a New York hedge fund manager received prison sentences on Tuesday for engaging in an insider trading conspiracy involving the children's clothing company's stock....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two former executives at Carter's Inc and a New York hedge fund manager received prison sentences on Tuesday for engaging in an insider trading conspiracy involving the children's clothing company's stock.

headline.print_headline: Argentina Coach Re Brazil: Football Is Illogical
headline.main: Argentina Coach Re Brazil: Football Is Illogical

docs.snippet: Like everyone else, Argentina coach Alejandro Sabella can't explain Brazil's collapse to lose 7-1 to Germany in the semifinals of its home World Cup....
docs.lead_paragraph: Like everyone else, Argentina coach Alejandro Sabella can't explain Brazil's collapse to lose 7-1 to Germany in the semifinals of its home World Cup.

docs.snippet: Three players from each of the American and National leagues were named Tuesday to participate in the Home Run Derby....
docs.lead_paragraph: Three players from each of the American and National leagues were named Tuesday to participate in the Home Run Derby.

headline.print_headline: Islamic State Appeals to Only Four Percent of Syrians: Poll
headline.main: Islamic State Appeals to Only Four Percent of Syrians: Poll

docs.snippet: Only four percent of Syrians believe Islamic State insurgents, who have captured large swathes of Syria and Iraq, represent their interests, according to research conducted by a British polling group published on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Only four percent of Syrians believe Islamic State insurgents, who have captured large swathes of Syria and Iraq, represent their interests, according to research conducted by a British polling group published on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Scolari Apologizes for Brazil's World Cup Failure
headline.main: Scolari Apologizes for Brazil's World Cup Failure

docs.snippet: Brazil coach Luiz Felipe Scolari apologized to fans for failing to lead the host to the World Cup final, saying the "catastrophic" defeat to Germany on Tuesday marked the "worst day" of his professional life....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil coach Luiz Felipe Scolari apologized to fans for failing to lead the host to the World Cup final, saying the "catastrophic" defeat to Germany on Tuesday marked the "worst day" of his professional life.
